The labor of the faithful minister is to be connected with the labors of the physicians. All the workers are to consecrate their talents to the building up of the [Sydney Sanitarium] institution. If they will reflect the 


                                   -136- 

light of heaven, souls will be converted. God is to be made first and last and best in everything. The proclamation of the truth for this time is to be the one great interest.--Letter 8, 1903, p. 4. (To Elder J. A. Burden and wife, January 5, 1903.)
